So let’s talk about that.</p>\n<p><a class=\"more-link\" href=\"https://dontwastethecrumbs.com/2017/04/toiletries-budget/\">Click to Continue »</a></p>\n<img width=\"600\" height=\"800\" src=\"https://dontwastethecrumbs.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Budget-for-Toiletries-Cover.jpg\" class=\"attachment-large size-large\" alt=\"How to Make a Toiletries Budget\" data-pin-media=\"true\" style=\"display:none;\" srcset=\"https://dontwastethecrumbs.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Budget-for-Toiletries-Cover.jpg 600w, https://dontwastethecrumbs.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Budget-for-Toiletries-Cover-225x300.jpg 225w, https://dontwastethecrumbs.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Budget-for-Toiletries-Cover-300x400.jpg 300w, https://dontwastethecrumbs.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Budget-for-Toiletries-Cover-100x133.jpg 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px\"></div><!--end post_class()-->\n\n<div class=\"post-56724 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-desserts entry gfwa-2 gfwa-even jpibfi_container\"><h2><a href=\"https://dontwastethecrumbs.com/2017/04/peanut-butter-cups/\" title=\"Healthy Peanut Butter Cups\">Healthy Peanut Butter Cups</a></h2><p class=\"byline post-info\"><time class=\"entry-time\" itemprop=\"datePublished\" datetime=\"2017-04-17T02:30:28+00:00\">April 17, 2017</time> By <span class=\"entry-author\" itemprop=\"author\" itemscope=\"\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Person\"><a href=\"https://dontwastethecrumbs.com/author/terczaktrio/\" class=\"entry-author-link\" itemprop=\"url\" rel=\"author\"><span class=\"entry-author-name\" itemprop=\"name\">Tiffany</span></a></span> <span class=\"entry-comments-link\"><a href=\"https://dontwastethecrumbs.com/2017/04/peanut-butter-cups/#comments\">3 Comments</a></span></p><input class=\"jpibfi\" type=\"hidden\"><p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-56775 size-full\" title=\"These homemade peanut butter cups are healthy and are a copycat of Reese's. We’re also trying to <a href=\"http://dontwastethecrumbs.com/2016/02/quitting-sugar/\">eliminate white sugar</a> from the house whenever possible.)</em></p>\n<p>But before you write this candy recipe off, let me preface it with this: these healthy peanut butter cups require just 3 real food ingredients that you probably have in your pantry.</p>\n<p><a class=\"more-link\"
